phrs.translation: 瓦格纳, 制作马车的人, 街道地址, 瓦戈纳
瓦格纳, 约翰·瓦格纳
瓦格纳, 标签, 瓦戈纳
大力神与车夫, 赫刺克勒斯和车夫

sentences.sentence: "Enough of your foolish chatter," said the waggoner.
sentences.translation: “别再愚蠢地喋喋不休了。”车夫说。

sentences.sentence: A waggoner who was striding behind him heard this and asked, "Who are you?"
sentences.translation: 一个阔步走在他后面的车夫听到了这话，问道：“你是谁？”

sentences.sentence: A waggoner was once driving a heavy load on a very muddy road.
sentences.translation: 一名车夫赶着货车沿着一条非常泥泞的小路前行。
